title: We Wasted $1527 on Mystery Tech...
description: "Well that's not how Mystery Tech was supposed to go." The Drop Bounty Box:  The Gears 5 Xbox One X Limited Edition on Amazon:  Giant USB Enter Button on Amazon:  Samsung Galaxy View 2 tablet:  Socker Boppers on Amazon:   Thanks to Madeon for that sweet, sweet new song All My Friends:    By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
